refnamediv.refpurpose: List of characters to allow ulink URLs to be automatically hyphenated on

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: If the ulink.hyphenate is not empty, then hyphenation of ulinks is turned on, and any character contained in this parameter is treated as an allowable hyphenation point.
